Reviews.Title: Love My New Canon EOS 70D
Reviews.Author: Cathy Thomas
Reviews.Content: I received my camera on my birthday and started using right away. I have some learning to do, but so far I have used it on one photo job and the pictures turned out awesome. I highly recommend this camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS 70D 20.2 MP Dual Pixel CMOS Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S IS STM Lens Brand New USA w/ All Supplied Manufacturer Accessories
Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
Canon EF 50mm f/1.8 II SLR Lens Brand New USA w/Supplied Manufacturer Accessories
LP-E8 Rechargeable Lithium Ion Replacement Battery + External Rapid Quick-Charger with Car Charger
